verses.verse: <S%G5154><s%> This Third Time <S%G5124><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%> In The <S%G1909><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of Two <S%G1417><s%> Witnessess <S%G3144><s%> Or <S%G2532><s%> Of Three <S%G5140><s%> Shall Be Established <S%G2476><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Matter. <S%G4487><s%>

I Have Before Declared <S%G4280><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Say Beforehand, <S%G4302><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Being Present <S%G3918><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second Time, <S%G1208><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Absent <S%G548><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Before Sinned, <S%G4258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2064><s%> I Come <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Will Not Spare. <S%G5339><s%>

Since <S%G1893><s%> A Proof <S%G1382><s%> Ye Seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Weak, <S%G770><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Is Powerful <S%G1414><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Indeed <S%G1063><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> He Was Crucified <S%G4717><s%> In <S%G1537><s%> Weakness, <S%G769><s%> Yet <S%G235><s%> He Lives <S%G2198><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> God's; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Indeed <S%G1063><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Are Weak <S%G770><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> We Shall Live <S%G2198><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Try Ye <S%G3985><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith; <S%G4102><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Prove : <S%G1381><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not Recognize <S%G1921><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Unless <S%G5100><s%> Rejected <S%G96><s%> Ye Are? <S%G2075><s%>
<S%G1679><s%> Now I Hope <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Will Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G2070><s%> Rejected. <S%G96><s%>

<S%G2172><s%> But I Pray <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> God That <S%G3361><s%> May Do <S%G4160><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Nothing; <S%G3367><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Approved <S%G1384><s%> May Appear, <S%G5316><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> What Is <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G2570><s%> May Do, <S%G4160><s%> <S%G2249><s%> And We <S%G1161><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Rejected <S%G96><s%> Be. <S%G5600><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Have We Power <S%G1410><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G5463><s%> For We Rejoice <S%G1063><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> May Be Weak, <S%G770><s%> <S%G5210><s%> And Ye <S%G1161><s%> Poerful <S%G1415><s%> May Be. <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Pray For, <S%G2172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Perfecting. <S%G2676><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> On This Account <S%G5124><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Being Absent <S%G548><s%> I Write, <S%G1125><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Being Present <S%G3918><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> With Severity <S%G664><s%> I May Treat You, <S%G5530><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Overthrowing. <S%G2506><s%>

For The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> Rejoice; <S%G5463><s%> Be Perfected; <S%G2675><s%> Be Encouraged; <S%G3870><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Same Thing <S%G846><s%> Mind; <S%G5426><s%> Be At Peace; <S%G1514><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Love <S%G26><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Holy <S%G40><s%> Kiss. <S%G5370><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Corinthians <S%G2881><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Philippi <S%G5375><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Luke. <S%G3065><s%>
